remarks: The subgroup sum evaluated within a subgroup.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2016.)
statement:
subglsm.h $e |- H = ( G |`s S ) $.
subglsm.s $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) $.
subglsm.a $e |- A = ( LSSum ` H ) $.
subglsm $p |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ T C_ S /\ U C_ S ) -> ( T .(+) U ) = ( T A U ) ) $.
